<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Get consent information"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/client-implementation/pix/recurring-payments/consent/{recurringConsentPactualId}/enrichment"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] The client has to implement this endpoint to provide us with some information we might need for the consent. For example: the dropReason sent to PCM says if the provider has the loggedUser in its client database. We will call this endpoint if we need to send this information to PCM.
For more information, access the [Open Banking Brazil Official Documentation] (https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/37912663/Documenta+o+da+API).
The path can be parametrized by the client, it is just a suggestion, except by the fact that it must receive the ConsentPactualId as a route or query parameter.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"recurringConsentPactualId","description":"The Recurring Consent PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Consent Enrichment Response","type":"object","properties":{"dropReason":{"description":"Information on why the user has dropped the consent. NO_CREDENTIAL should be returned if the user is not a client of the provider. Otherwise, NONE should be returned.","type":"string","enum":["NONE","NO_CREDENTIAL"]}},"title":"ConsentEnrichment"},"examples":{"ConsentEnrichmentResponseExample":{"value":{"dropReason":"NO_CREDENTIAL"}}}}},"description":"Consent Enrichment response."},"401":{"description":"Response when a request is not authorized for the user."},"404":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"PactualErrorResponse","description":"Default response body in case of any errors.","type":"object","properties":{"version":{"description":"Api version.","type":"string"},"status":{"description":"Http status code.","type":"string"},"errors":{"description":"Array of errors.","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"errorCode":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}}}}},"example":{"version":"1.0.0","status":400,"errors":[{"errorCode":"PCE001","message":"The field 'name' is required."},{"errorCode":"PCE002","message":"The field 'taxId' is incorrect."}]}},"examples":{"NotFoundExample":{"value":{"version":"1.0.0","status":404}}}}},"description":"A NotFound response."},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"PactualErrorResponse","description":"Default response body in case of any errors.","type":"object","properties":{"version":{"description":"Api version.","type":"string"},"status":{"description":"Http status code.","type":"string"},"errors":{"description":"Array of errors.","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"errorCode":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}}}}},"example":{"version":"1.0.0","status":400,"errors":[{"errorCode":"PCE001","message":"The field 'name' is required."},{"errorCode":"PCE002","message":"The field 'taxId' is incorrect."}]}},"examples":{"InternalServerErrorExample":{"value":{"version":"1.0.0","status":500,"errors":[{"errorCode":"PIE001","message":"Internal server error"}]}}}}},"description":"Internal server error responses."}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
